summary: A renegade Megarobot pilot and an archaeologist must team up to thwart the Centro's attempts to resurrect a hidden Megarobot, with which they can challenge the prevailing order.
cast: Don Michael Paul|Barbara Crampton|James Staley|Lisa Rinna|Danny Kamekona|Yuji Okumoto|J. Downing|Peter Haskell|Sam Scarber|Steve Eastin|Peter Vasquez|Juan Garcia|Burke Byrnes|Keith Payson|Pamela Denise Weaver|Lee Magnuson|Martin L. Carlton|Eric B. Sindon|Breck A. Graham|Benjamin Sitzer
title: Robot Wars
